####Places I'd rather be right now

```{r}
library(leaflet)
place <- data.frame(lat = c(20.628086, -22.971830, 47.263388), 
                    lng = c(-87.066625, -43.183545, 11.400604),
                    label = c("Playa Del Carmen", "Rio", "Innsbruck"))

place %>%
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(popup = place$label) %>%
    fitBounds(lng1 = max(place$lng),
              lat1 = max(place$lat) + 5,
              lng2 = min(place$lng),
              lat2 = min(place$lat))
```
